channel.title: p5js on Carles Hernandez-Ferrer
channel.description: Recent content in p5js on Carles Hernandez-Ferrer

item.title: Winter Card 2020 - 2021
item.description: This past year has been a really significant one with many challenges. Therefore I wanted to make a winter card that shows the opposite: simplicity, elegance, and, specially, joy. Winter card 2020 - 2021: Happy Yultide! So, the winter card it is juts a snowing page that allows you to discover your present, from a possible random set of 35 different drawings. You can play it clicking the previous picture.
